content: these adorable bows are for babies newborn to 1 year but you could certainly add a longer elastic band for toddlers i have made three bow headbands one knitted in garter stitch with worsted wool it has 3 large french knots at the center the easiest bow is made from 2-inch wide lace and has a store-bought ribbon rosette at the center the third bow is made from calico fabric and has a rosette at the center these would make great gifts for baby showers or to mark milestones in the baby s life i made all 3 on a sunday morn it was fun i do have a bit of a mess to clean up but sometimes life s messy i design free patterns hoping you ll donate if able to help prevent veteran and military suicides and for the salvation army because everyone needs help at weak moments thank you from the bottom of my heart easy links direct to them on my rav page
